name.japanese: アマゾン・リリー闘技場

description: The execution arena of Amazon Lily where criminals and rule-breakers are forced to fight against the Gorgon Sisters. The arena features a circular fighting pit surrounded by spectator stands filled with Kuja warriors.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Activates Gear 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy activates Gear 2 in the arena, turning the tide of battle against the Gorgon Sisters with his enhanced speed.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Uses Jet Gatling
keyEvents.description: Luffy unleashes Jet Gatling to counter both sisters' ultimate techniques simultaneously in the arena.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Shields Sandersonia's Back
keyEvents.description: In the most pivotal moment in the arena, Luffy protects Sandersonia's exposed back from the watching crowd, hiding the slave mark and earning the sisters' trust.

keyEvents.title: Arena Evacuation Ordered
keyEvents.description: Hancock orders the immediate evacuation of all spectators from the arena to protect her sisters' secret after witnessing Luffy's compassion.
